descriptionHtml:
[center][COLOR=#c4bd97][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]L[/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]i[/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Impact][SIZE=7]ttle Merchants[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[img]http://medlem.spray.se/gardestadsvanner/hpbimg/m_avdelare30.gif[/img]
This mod adds a house close to Markarth that has 6 merchants and 4 followers.
The merchants sells almost Every amor/weapons/spells/bows/arrows/clothes and jewelry There is in skyrim.

[FONT=Comic Sans MS][SIZE=4]If you have [/SIZE][SIZE=5]Dawnguard[/SIZE][SIZE=4] go in to Files and[/SIZE][/FONT] [FONT=Impact][SIZE=5][COLOR=#ffff00]DWM [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][SIZE=4][FONT=Comic Sans MS]on[/FONT][/SIZE] [SIZE=5]"[/SIZE]*[FONT=Impact][SIZE=4][U]MAIN FILE[/U][/SIZE][/FONT]*+[SIZE=4][FONT=Comic Sans MS][B]Dawnguard[/B][/FONT][/SIZE] DLC[SIZE=5]"[/SIZE]
[line]
If enough people want i will make 1 more merchant with Dragonborn Item.
ERROR ON TH EMOD I JUST GOT TO KNOW THAT YOU NEED BOTH DAWNGUARD AND DRAGONBORN TO USE THIS MOD!
[line]
Made by: CreepyGoatMilk

Thanks to DARKFOX127 For making the BEST skyrim creation kit Tutorials there is on Youtube.

[FONT=Impact][SIZE=6][B][URL=http://www.youtube.com/user/DARKF0X127]DARKFOX127[/URL][/B][/SIZE][/FONT][/CENTER]
